articles.content: After teaching my morning classes at CycleBar, where Ive been an instructor for years, I went home for the afternoon and took a nap. Then, I went back to the studio to teach my classes for the evenin… [+1902 chars]

articles.title: People Share 79 Random Disturbing Facts They Know For Whatever Reason - Bored Panda
articles.description: According to ABC News, the most common ‘biggest fears’ people have are social phobias, the fear of open spaces, the fear of heights, the fear of flying, claustrophobia, the fear of insects, and the fear of snakes. And while you might be feeling calm and colle…
